ModMetaData.name: Memory Implants
ModMetaData.author: Chrido
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds implants similar to Neural Computation, but for memory to slow the rate of skill loss to just 20% of the original value.
The drawback is that the pawn will get brain shocked by EMP damage and also has a penalty to learning.
Needs a techprint to be researched.
Memory assistant Skill loss 20% Learning speed -20%
REQUIRES ROYALTY DLC!
